ChangeLog   ChangeLog 
0.12.3 [2013-09-08]
Bugfix release with new plugin.
- new plugin - Bright Novae;
- added intermediate value to ZHR of shooting stars between 80 and 10000 (L
P: #1208106);
- fixed search tool (LP: #1208296, #1211198);
- fixed behaviour for shortkeys of few plugins (LP: #1208291);
- fixed Flamsteed designations for few Virgo stars (LP: #1222094);
- fixed saving Milky Way brightness via GUI (LP: #1220477)
0.12.2 [2013-08-04] 0.12.2 [2013-08-04]
Bugfix release with few new features. Bugfix release with few new features.

- automatic adding of new satellites on update from selected update sources ; - automatic adding of new satellites on update from selected update sources ;
by default, only new naked-eye satellites are auto-added by default, only new naked-eye satellites are auto-added

sources sources
